name: The Harm Reduction Therapy Center
description: The Harm Reduction Therapy Center is a non-profit organization founded in 2000 to help people who have drug and/or alcohol addiction. Staffed by licensed mental health professionals, the Center provides Harm Reduction Therapy (HRT) as an alternative for clients whose lives are so traumatized and chaotic that they need more than the simple “just say no” advice and programs that require them to commit to the goal of abstinence. HRT is a combination of substance misuse treatment with psychotherapy,
